author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Schluter linear drain adaptor tips…clamping ring drains are frequently used inside showers. I’m using the Schluter KERDI-LINE-A Adaptor to covert it to a KERDI-LINE linear drain. The adaptor is bonded to the clamping ring drain with KERDI-FIX. I hand-tighten the bolts and ratchet them another 1/4 turn. The linear drain slides down into the adaptor, which is pretty slick. Many thanks to Schluter for sponsoring this tutorial 🔥#plumbing #schlutersystems #showerdrain #linearshowerdrain #bathroomremodel #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
